name: garden-mirror-backend
description: Backend API for Garden Mirror Event Management System

scripts.test-db: node -e "require('mongoose').connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI || 'mongodb://localhost:27017/garden-mirror').then(() => console.log('✅ Database connection successful')).catch(err => console.error('❌ Database connection failed:', err.message))"

author: Garden Mirror Team
